member.name: T:Amazon.AWSHealth.Model.AffectedEntity
member.summary: Information about an entity that is affected by a Health event.

member.name: P:Amazon.AWSHealth.Model.AffectedEntity.AwsAccountId
member.summary:
Gets and sets the property AwsAccountId.
The 12-digit AWS account number that contains the affected entity.

member.name: P:Amazon.AWSHealth.Model.AffectedEntity.EntityArn
member.summary:
Gets and sets the property EntityArn.
The unique identifier for the entity. Format: arn:aws:health:entity-region:aws-account:entity/entity-id . Example: arn:aws:health:us-east-1:111222333444:entity/AVh5GGT7ul1arKr1sE1K

member.name: P:Amazon.AWSHealth.Model.AffectedEntity.EntityUrl
member.summary: Gets and sets the property EntityUrl.

member.name: P:Amazon.AWSHealth.Model.AffectedEntity.EntityValue
member.summary:
Gets and sets the property EntityValue.
The ID of the affected entity.

member.name: P:Amazon.AWSHealth.Model.AffectedEntity.EventArn
member.summary:
Gets and sets the property EventArn.
The unique identifier for the event. Format: arn:aws:health:event-region::event/SERVICE/EVENT_TYPE_CODE/EVENT_TYPE_PLUS_ID . Example: Example: arn:aws:health:us-east-1::event/EC2/EC2_INSTANCE_RETIREMENT_SCHEDULED/EC2_INSTANCE_RETIREMENT_SCHEDULED_ABC123-DEF456

member.name: P:Amazon.AWSHealth.Model.AffectedEntity.LastUpdatedTime
member.summary:
Gets and sets the property LastUpdatedTime.
The most recent time that the entity was updated.

member.name: P:Amazon.AWSHealth.Model.AffectedEntity.StatusCode
member.summary:
Gets and sets the property StatusCode.
The most recent status of the entity affected by the event. The possible values are IMPAIRED, UNIMPAIRED, and UNKNOWN.

member.name: P:Amazon.AWSHealth.Model.AffectedEntity.Tags
member.summary:
Gets and sets the property Tags.
A map of entity tags attached to the affected entity.

member.name: T:Amazon.AWSHealth.Model.DateTimeRange
member.summary: A range of dates and times that is used by the EventFilter and EntityFilter objects. If from is set and to is set: match items where the timestamp (startTime, endTime, or lastUpdatedTime) is between from and to inclusive. If from is set and to is not set: match items where the timestamp value is equal to or after from. If from is not set and to is set: match items where the timestamp value is equal to or before to.

member.name: P:Amazon.AWSHealth.Model.DateTimeRange.From
member.summary:
Gets and sets the property From.
The starting date and time of a time range.

member.name: P:Amazon.AWSHealth.Model.DateTimeRange.To
member.summary:
Gets and sets the property To.
The ending date and time of a time range.

member.name: T:Amazon.AWSHealth.Model.DescribeAffectedEntitiesRequest
member.summary:
Container for the parameters to the DescribeAffectedEntities operation. Returns a list of entities that have been affected by the specified events, based on the specified filter criteria. Entities can refer to individual customer resources, groups of customer resources, or any other construct, depending on the AWS service. Events that have impact beyond that of the affected entities, or where the extent of impact is unknown, include at least one entity indicating this.
At least one event ARN is required. Results are sorted by the lastUpdatedTime of the entity, starting with the most recent.

member.name: P:Amazon.AWSHealth.Model.DescribeAffectedEntitiesRequest.Filter
member.summary:
Gets and sets the property Filter.
Values to narrow the results returned. At least one event ARN is required.

member.name: P:Amazon.AWSHealth.Model.DescribeAffectedEntitiesRequest.Locale
member.summary:
Gets and sets the property Locale.
The locale (language) to return information in. English (en) is the default and the only supported value at this time.

member.name: P:Amazon.AWSHealth.Model.DescribeAffectedEntitiesRequest.MaxResults
member.summary:
Gets and sets the property MaxResults.
The maximum number of items to return in one batch, between 10 and 100, inclusive.

member.name: P:Amazon.AWSHealth.Model.DescribeAffectedEntitiesRequest.NextToken
member.summary:
Gets and sets the property NextToken.
If the results of a search are large, only a portion of the results are returned, and a nextToken pagination token is returned in the response. To retrieve the next batch of results, reissue the search request and include the returned token. When all results have been returned, the response does not contain a pagination token value.

member.name: T:Amazon.AWSHealth.Model.DescribeAffectedEntitiesResponse
member.summary: This is the response object from the DescribeAffectedEntities operation.

member.name: P:Amazon.AWSHealth.Model.DescribeAffectedEntitiesResponse.Entities
member.summary:
Gets and sets the property Entities.
The entities that match the filter criteria.

member.name: P:Amazon.AWSHealth.Model.DescribeAffectedEntitiesResponse.NextToken
member.summary:
Gets and sets the property NextToken.
If the results of a search are large, only a portion of the results are returned, and a nextToken pagination token is returned in the response. To retrieve the next batch of results, reissue the search request and include the returned token. When all results have been returned, the response does not contain a pagination token value.

member.name: T:Amazon.AWSHealth.Model.DescribeEntityAggregatesRequest
member.summary: Container for the parameters to the DescribeEntityAggregates operation. Returns the number of entities that are affected by each of the specified events. If no events are specified, the counts of all affected entities are returned.

member.name: P:Amazon.AWSHealth.Model.DescribeEntityAggregatesRequest.EventArns
member.summary:
Gets and sets the property EventArns.
A list of event ARNs (unique identifiers). For example: "arn:aws:health:us-east-1::event/EC2/EC2_INSTANCE_RETIREMENT_SCHEDULED/EC2_INSTANCE_RETIREMENT_SCHEDULED_ABC123-CDE456", "arn:aws:health:us-west-1::event/EBS/AWS_EBS_LOST_VOLUME/AWS_EBS_LOST_VOLUME_CHI789_JKL101"

member.name: T:Amazon.AWSHealth.Model.DescribeEntityAggregatesResponse
member.summary: This is the response object from the DescribeEntityAggregates operation.

member.name: P:Amazon.AWSHealth.Model.DescribeEntityAggregatesResponse.EntityAggregates
member.summary:
Gets and sets the property EntityAggregates.
The number of entities that are affected by each of the specified events.

member.name: T:Amazon.AWSHealth.Model.DescribeEventAggregatesRequest
member.summary: Container for the parameters to the DescribeEventAggregates operation. Returns the number of events of each event type (issue, scheduled change, and account notification). If no filter is specified, the counts of all events in each category are returned.

member.name: P:Amazon.AWSHealth.Model.DescribeEventAggregatesRequest.AggregateField
member.summary:
Gets and sets the property AggregateField.
The only currently supported value is eventTypeCategory.

member.name: P:Amazon.AWSHealth.Model.DescribeEventAggregatesRequest.Filter
member.summary:
Gets and sets the property Filter.
Values to narrow the results returned.

member.name: P:Amazon.AWSHealth.Model.DescribeEventAggregatesRequest.MaxResults
member.summary:
Gets and sets the property MaxResults.
The maximum number of items to return in one batch, between 10 and 100, inclusive.

member.name: P:Amazon.AWSHealth.Model.DescribeEventAggregatesRequest.NextToken
member.summary:
Gets and sets the property NextToken.
If the results of a search are large, only a portion of the results are returned, and a nextToken pagination token is returned in the response. To retrieve the next batch of results, reissue the search request and include the returned token. When all results have been returned, the response does not contain a pagination token value.

member.name: T:Amazon.AWSHealth.Model.DescribeEventAggregatesResponse
member.summary: This is the response object from the DescribeEventAggregates operation.

member.name: P:Amazon.AWSHealth.Model.DescribeEventAggregatesResponse.EventAggregates
member.summary:
Gets and sets the property EventAggregates.
The number of events in each category that meet the optional filter criteria.

member.name: P:Amazon.AWSHealth.Model.DescribeEventAggregatesResponse.NextToken
member.summary:
Gets and sets the property NextToken.
If the results of a search are large, only a portion of the results are returned, and a nextToken pagination token is returned in the response. To retrieve the next batch of results, reissue the search request and include the returned token. When all results have been returned, the response does not contain a pagination token value.

member.name: T:Amazon.AWSHealth.Model.DescribeEventDetailsRequest
member.summary:
Container for the parameters to the DescribeEventDetails operation. Returns detailed information about one or more specified events. Information includes standard event data (region, service, etc., as returned by DescribeEvents), a detailed event description, and possible additional metadata that depends upon the nature of the event. Affected entities are not included; to retrieve those, use the DescribeAffectedEntities operation.
If a specified event cannot be retrieved, an error message is returned for that event.

member.name: P:Amazon.AWSHealth.Model.DescribeEventDetailsRequest.EventArns
member.summary:
Gets and sets the property EventArns.
A list of event ARNs (unique identifiers). For example: "arn:aws:health:us-east-1::event/EC2/EC2_INSTANCE_RETIREMENT_SCHEDULED/EC2_INSTANCE_RETIREMENT_SCHEDULED_ABC123-CDE456", "arn:aws:health:us-west-1::event/EBS/AWS_EBS_LOST_VOLUME/AWS_EBS_LOST_VOLUME_CHI789_JKL101"

member.name: P:Amazon.AWSHealth.Model.DescribeEventDetailsRequest.Locale
member.summary:
Gets and sets the property Locale.
The locale (language) to return information in. English (en) is the default and the only supported value at this time.

member.name: T:Amazon.AWSHealth.Model.DescribeEventDetailsResponse
member.summary: This is the response object from the DescribeEventDetails operation.

member.name: P:Amazon.AWSHealth.Model.DescribeEventDetailsResponse.FailedSet
member.summary:
Gets and sets the property FailedSet.
Error messages for any events that could not be retrieved.

member.name: P:Amazon.AWSHealth.Model.DescribeEventDetailsResponse.SuccessfulSet
member.summary:
Gets and sets the property SuccessfulSet.
Information about the events that could be retrieved.

member.name: T:Amazon.AWSHealth.Model.DescribeEventsRequest
member.summary:
Container for the parameters to the DescribeEvents operation. Returns information about events that meet the specified filter criteria. Events are returned in a summary form and do not include the detailed description, any additional metadata that depends on the event type, or any affected resources. To retrieve that information, use the DescribeEventDetails and DescribeAffectedEntities operations.
If no filter criteria are specified, all events are returned. Results are sorted by lastModifiedTime, starting with the most recent.

member.name: P:Amazon.AWSHealth.Model.DescribeEventsRequest.Filter
member.summary:
Gets and sets the property Filter.
Values to narrow the results returned.

member.name: P:Amazon.AWSHealth.Model.DescribeEventsRequest.Locale
member.summary:
Gets and sets the property Locale.
The locale (language) to return information in. English (en) is the default and the only supported value at this time.

member.name: P:Amazon.AWSHealth.Model.DescribeEventsRequest.MaxResults
member.summary:
Gets and sets the property MaxResults.
The maximum number of items to return in one batch, between 10 and 100, inclusive.

member.name: P:Amazon.AWSHealth.Model.DescribeEventsRequest.NextToken
member.summary:
Gets and sets the property NextToken.
If the results of a search are large, only a portion of the results are returned, and a nextToken pagination token is returned in the response. To retrieve the next batch of results, reissue the search request and include the returned token. When all results have been returned, the response does not contain a pagination token value.

member.name: T:Amazon.AWSHealth.Model.DescribeEventsResponse
member.summary: This is the response object from the DescribeEvents operation.

member.name: P:Amazon.AWSHealth.Model.DescribeEventsResponse.Events
member.summary:
Gets and sets the property Events.
The events that match the specified filter criteria.

member.name: P:Amazon.AWSHealth.Model.DescribeEventsResponse.NextToken
member.summary:
Gets and sets the property NextToken.
If the results of a search are large, only a portion of the results are returned, and a nextToken pagination token is returned in the response. To retrieve the next batch of results, reissue the search request and include the returned token. When all results have been returned, the response does not contain a pagination token value.

member.name: T:Amazon.AWSHealth.Model.DescribeEventTypesRequest
member.summary: Container for the parameters to the DescribeEventTypes operation. Returns the event types that meet the specified filter criteria. If no filter criteria are specified, all event types are returned, in no particular order.

member.name: P:Amazon.AWSHealth.Model.DescribeEventTypesRequest.Filter
member.summary:
Gets and sets the property Filter.
Values to narrow the results returned.

member.name: P:Amazon.AWSHealth.Model.DescribeEventTypesRequest.Locale
member.summary:
Gets and sets the property Locale.
The locale (language) to return information in. English (en) is the default and the only supported value at this time.

member.name: P:Amazon.AWSHealth.Model.DescribeEventTypesRequest.MaxResults
member.summary:
Gets and sets the property MaxResults.
The maximum number of items to return in one batch, between 10 and 100, inclusive.

member.name: P:Amazon.AWSHealth.Model.DescribeEventTypesRequest.NextToken
member.summary:
Gets and sets the property NextToken.
If the results of a search are large, only a portion of the results are returned, and a nextToken pagination token is returned in the response. To retrieve the next batch of results, reissue the search request and include the returned token. When all results have been returned, the response does not contain a pagination token value.

member.name: T:Amazon.AWSHealth.Model.DescribeEventTypesResponse
member.summary: This is the response object from the DescribeEventTypes operation.

member.name: P:Amazon.AWSHealth.Model.DescribeEventTypesResponse.EventTypes
member.summary:
Gets and sets the property EventTypes.
A list of event types that match the filter criteria. Event types have a category (issue, accountNotification, or scheduledChange), a service (for example, EC2, RDS, DATAPIPELINE, BILLING), and a code (in the format AWS_SERVICE_DESCRIPTION ; for example, AWS_EC2_SYSTEM_MAINTENANCE_EVENT).

member.name: P:Amazon.AWSHealth.Model.DescribeEventTypesResponse.NextToken
member.summary:
Gets and sets the property NextToken.
If the results of a search are large, only a portion of the results are returned, and a nextToken pagination token is returned in the response. To retrieve the next batch of results, reissue the search request and include the returned token. When all results have been returned, the response does not contain a pagination token value.

member.name: T:Amazon.AWSHealth.Model.EntityAggregate
member.summary: The number of entities that are affected by one or more events. Returned by the DescribeEntityAggregates operation.

member.name: P:Amazon.AWSHealth.Model.EntityAggregate.Count
member.summary:
Gets and sets the property Count.
The number entities that match the criteria for the specified events.

member.name: P:Amazon.AWSHealth.Model.EntityAggregate.EventArn
member.summary:
Gets and sets the property EventArn.
The unique identifier for the event. Format: arn:aws:health:event-region::event/SERVICE/EVENT_TYPE_CODE/EVENT_TYPE_PLUS_ID . Example: Example: arn:aws:health:us-east-1::event/EC2/EC2_INSTANCE_RETIREMENT_SCHEDULED/EC2_INSTANCE_RETIREMENT_SCHEDULED_ABC123-DEF456

member.name: T:Amazon.AWSHealth.Model.EntityFilter
member.summary: The values to use to filter results from the DescribeAffectedEntities operation.

member.name: P:Amazon.AWSHealth.Model.EntityFilter.EntityArns
member.summary:
Gets and sets the property EntityArns.
A list of entity ARNs (unique identifiers).

member.name: P:Amazon.AWSHealth.Model.EntityFilter.EntityValues
member.summary:
Gets and sets the property EntityValues.
A list of IDs for affected entities.

member.name: P:Amazon.AWSHealth.Model.EntityFilter.EventArns
member.summary:
Gets and sets the property EventArns.
A list of event ARNs (unique identifiers). For example: "arn:aws:health:us-east-1::event/EC2/EC2_INSTANCE_RETIREMENT_SCHEDULED/EC2_INSTANCE_RETIREMENT_SCHEDULED_ABC123-CDE456", "arn:aws:health:us-west-1::event/EBS/AWS_EBS_LOST_VOLUME/AWS_EBS_LOST_VOLUME_CHI789_JKL101"

member.name: P:Amazon.AWSHealth.Model.EntityFilter.LastUpdatedTimes
member.summary:
Gets and sets the property LastUpdatedTimes.
A list of the most recent dates and times that the entity was updated.

member.name: P:Amazon.AWSHealth.Model.EntityFilter.StatusCodes
member.summary:
Gets and sets the property StatusCodes.
A list of entity status codes (IMPAIRED, UNIMPAIRED, or UNKNOWN).

member.name: P:Amazon.AWSHealth.Model.EntityFilter.Tags
member.summary:
Gets and sets the property Tags.
A map of entity tags attached to the affected entity.

member.name: T:Amazon.AWSHealth.Model.Event
member.summary: Summary information about an event, returned by the DescribeEvents operation. The DescribeEventDetails operation also returns this information, as well as the EventDescription and additional event metadata.

member.name: P:Amazon.AWSHealth.Model.Event.Arn
member.summary:
Gets and sets the property Arn.
The unique identifier for the event. Format: arn:aws:health:event-region::event/SERVICE/EVENT_TYPE_CODE/EVENT_TYPE_PLUS_ID . Example: Example: arn:aws:health:us-east-1::event/EC2/EC2_INSTANCE_RETIREMENT_SCHEDULED/EC2_INSTANCE_RETIREMENT_SCHEDULED_ABC123-DEF456

member.name: P:Amazon.AWSHealth.Model.Event.AvailabilityZone
member.summary:
Gets and sets the property AvailabilityZone.
The AWS Availability Zone of the event. For example, us-east-1a.

member.name: P:Amazon.AWSHealth.Model.Event.EndTime
member.summary:
Gets and sets the property EndTime.
The date and time that the event ended.

member.name: P:Amazon.AWSHealth.Model.Event.EventTypeCategory
member.summary:
Gets and sets the property EventTypeCategory.
The category of the event. Possible values are issue, scheduledChange, and accountNotification.

member.name: P:Amazon.AWSHealth.Model.Event.EventTypeCode
member.summary:
Gets and sets the property EventTypeCode.
The unique identifier for the event type. The format is AWS_SERVICE_DESCRIPTION ; for example, AWS_EC2_SYSTEM_MAINTENANCE_EVENT.

member.name: P:Amazon.AWSHealth.Model.Event.LastUpdatedTime
member.summary:
Gets and sets the property LastUpdatedTime.
The most recent date and time that the event was updated.

member.name: P:Amazon.AWSHealth.Model.Event.Region
member.summary:
Gets and sets the property Region.
The AWS region name of the event.

member.name: P:Amazon.AWSHealth.Model.Event.Service
member.summary:
Gets and sets the property Service.
The AWS service that is affected by the event. For example, EC2, RDS.

member.name: P:Amazon.AWSHealth.Model.Event.StartTime
member.summary:
Gets and sets the property StartTime.
The date and time that the event began.

member.name: P:Amazon.AWSHealth.Model.Event.StatusCode
member.summary:
Gets and sets the property StatusCode.
The most recent status of the event. Possible values are open, closed, and upcoming.

member.name: T:Amazon.AWSHealth.Model.EventAggregate
member.summary: The number of events of each issue type. Returned by the DescribeEventAggregates operation.

member.name: P:Amazon.AWSHealth.Model.EventAggregate.AggregateValue
member.summary:
Gets and sets the property AggregateValue.
The issue type for the associated count.

member.name: P:Amazon.AWSHealth.Model.EventAggregate.Count
member.summary:
Gets and sets the property Count.
The number of events of the associated issue type.

member.name: T:Amazon.AWSHealth.Model.EventDescription
member.summary: The detailed description of the event. Included in the information returned by the DescribeEventDetails operation.

member.name: P:Amazon.AWSHealth.Model.EventDescription.LatestDescription
member.summary:
Gets and sets the property LatestDescription.
The most recent description of the event.

member.name: T:Amazon.AWSHealth.Model.EventDetails
member.summary: Detailed information about an event. A combination of an Event object, an EventDescription object, and additional metadata about the event. Returned by the DescribeEventDetails operation.

member.name: P:Amazon.AWSHealth.Model.EventDetails.Event
member.summary:
Gets and sets the property Event.
Summary information about the event.

member.name: P:Amazon.AWSHealth.Model.EventDetails.EventDescription
member.summary:
Gets and sets the property EventDescription.
The most recent description of the event.

member.name: P:Amazon.AWSHealth.Model.EventDetails.EventMetadata
member.summary:
Gets and sets the property EventMetadata.
Additional metadata about the event.

member.name: T:Amazon.AWSHealth.Model.EventDetailsErrorItem
member.summary: Error information returned when a DescribeEventDetails operation cannot find a specified event.

member.name: P:Amazon.AWSHealth.Model.EventDetailsErrorItem.ErrorMessage
member.summary:
Gets and sets the property ErrorMessage.
A message that describes the error.

member.name: P:Amazon.AWSHealth.Model.EventDetailsErrorItem.ErrorName
member.summary:
Gets and sets the property ErrorName.
The name of the error.

member.name: P:Amazon.AWSHealth.Model.EventDetailsErrorItem.EventArn
member.summary:
Gets and sets the property EventArn.
The unique identifier for the event. Format: arn:aws:health:event-region::event/SERVICE/EVENT_TYPE_CODE/EVENT_TYPE_PLUS_ID . Example: Example: arn:aws:health:us-east-1::event/EC2/EC2_INSTANCE_RETIREMENT_SCHEDULED/EC2_INSTANCE_RETIREMENT_SCHEDULED_ABC123-DEF456

member.name: T:Amazon.AWSHealth.Model.EventFilter
member.summary: The values to use to filter results from the DescribeEvents and DescribeEventAggregates operations.

member.name: P:Amazon.AWSHealth.Model.EventFilter.AvailabilityZones
member.summary:
Gets and sets the property AvailabilityZones.
A list of AWS availability zones.

member.name: P:Amazon.AWSHealth.Model.EventFilter.EndTimes
member.summary:
Gets and sets the property EndTimes.
A list of dates and times that the event ended.

member.name: P:Amazon.AWSHealth.Model.EventFilter.EntityArns
member.summary:
Gets and sets the property EntityArns.
A list of entity ARNs (unique identifiers).

member.name: P:Amazon.AWSHealth.Model.EventFilter.EntityValues
member.summary:
Gets and sets the property EntityValues.
A list of entity identifiers, such as EC2 instance IDs (i-34ab692e) or EBS volumes (vol-426ab23e).

member.name: P:Amazon.AWSHealth.Model.EventFilter.EventArns
member.summary:
Gets and sets the property EventArns.
A list of event ARNs (unique identifiers). For example: "arn:aws:health:us-east-1::event/EC2/EC2_INSTANCE_RETIREMENT_SCHEDULED/EC2_INSTANCE_RETIREMENT_SCHEDULED_ABC123-CDE456", "arn:aws:health:us-west-1::event/EBS/AWS_EBS_LOST_VOLUME/AWS_EBS_LOST_VOLUME_CHI789_JKL101"

member.name: P:Amazon.AWSHealth.Model.EventFilter.EventStatusCodes
member.summary:
Gets and sets the property EventStatusCodes.
A list of event status codes.

member.name: P:Amazon.AWSHealth.Model.EventFilter.EventTypeCategories
member.summary:
Gets and sets the property EventTypeCategories.
A list of event type category codes (issue, scheduledChange, or accountNotification).

member.name: P:Amazon.AWSHealth.Model.EventFilter.EventTypeCodes
member.summary:
Gets and sets the property EventTypeCodes.
A list of unique identifiers for event types. For example, "AWS_EC2_SYSTEM_MAINTENANCE_EVENT","AWS_RDS_MAINTENANCE_SCHEDULED"

member.name: P:Amazon.AWSHealth.Model.EventFilter.LastUpdatedTimes
member.summary:
Gets and sets the property LastUpdatedTimes.
A list of dates and times that the event was last updated.

member.name: P:Amazon.AWSHealth.Model.EventFilter.Regions
member.summary:
Gets and sets the property Regions.
A list of AWS regions.

member.name: P:Amazon.AWSHealth.Model.EventFilter.Services
member.summary:
Gets and sets the property Services.
The AWS services associated with the event. For example, EC2, RDS.

member.name: P:Amazon.AWSHealth.Model.EventFilter.StartTimes
member.summary:
Gets and sets the property StartTimes.
A list of dates and times that the event began.

member.name: P:Amazon.AWSHealth.Model.EventFilter.Tags
member.summary:
Gets and sets the property Tags.
A map of entity tags attached to the affected entity.

member.name: T:Amazon.AWSHealth.Model.EventType
member.summary: Metadata about a type of event that is reported by AWS Health. Data consists of the category (for example, issue), the service (for example, EC2), and the event type code (for example, AWS_EC2_SYSTEM_MAINTENANCE_EVENT).

member.name: P:Amazon.AWSHealth.Model.EventType.Category
member.summary:
Gets and sets the property Category.
A list of event type category codes (issue, scheduledChange, or accountNotification).

member.name: P:Amazon.AWSHealth.Model.EventType.Code
member.summary:
Gets and sets the property Code.
The unique identifier for the event type. The format is AWS_SERVICE_DESCRIPTION ; for example, AWS_EC2_SYSTEM_MAINTENANCE_EVENT.

member.name: P:Amazon.AWSHealth.Model.EventType.Service
member.summary:
Gets and sets the property Service.
The AWS service that is affected by the event. For example, EC2, RDS.

member.name: T:Amazon.AWSHealth.Model.EventTypeFilter
member.summary: The values to use to filter results from the DescribeEventTypes operation.

member.name: P:Amazon.AWSHealth.Model.EventTypeFilter.EventTypeCategories
member.summary:

member.name: T:Amazon.AWSHealth.AmazonAWSHealthClient
member.summary:
Implementation for accessing AWSHealth
AWS Health
The AWS Health API provides programmatic access to the AWS Health information that is presented in the AWS Personal Health Dashboard. You can get information about events that affect your AWS resources:
DescribeEvents: Summary information about events.
DescribeEventDetails: Detailed information about one or more events.
DescribeAffectedEntities: Information about AWS resources that are affected by one or more events.
In addition, these operations provide information about event types and summary counts of events or affected entities:
DescribeEventTypes: Information about the kinds of events that AWS Health tracks.
DescribeEventAggregates: A count of the number of events that meet specified criteria.
DescribeEntityAggregates: A count of the number of affected entities that meet specified criteria.
The Health API requires a Business or Enterprise support plan from AWS Support. Calling the Health API from an account that does not have a Business or Enterprise support plan causes a SubscriptionRequiredException.
For authentication of requests, AWS Health uses the Signature Version 4 Signing Process.
See the AWS Health User Guide for information about how to use the API.
Service Endpoint
The HTTP endpoint for the AWS Health API is:
https://health.us-east-1.amazonaws.com

member.name: M:Amazon.AWSHealth.AmazonAWSHealthClient.#ctor
member.summary:
Constructs AmazonAWSHealthClient with the credentials loaded from the application's default configuration, and if unsuccessful from the Instance Profile service on an EC2 instance.
Example App.config with credentials set.
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?> <configuration> <appSettings> <add key="AWSProfileName" value="AWS Default"/> </appSettings> </configuration>

member.name: M:Amazon.AWSHealth.AmazonAWSHealthClient.#ctor(Amazon.RegionEndpoint)
member.summary:
Constructs AmazonAWSHealthClient with the credentials loaded from the application's default configuration, and if unsuccessful from the Instance Profile service on an EC2 instance.
Example App.config with credentials set.
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?> <configuration> <appSettings> <add key="AWSProfileName" value="AWS Default"/> </appSettings> </configuration>
member.param: The region to connect.

member.name: M:Amazon.AWSHealth.AmazonAWSHealthClient.#ctor(Amazon.AWSHealth.AmazonAWSHealthConfig)
member.summary:
Constructs AmazonAWSHealthClient with the credentials loaded from the application's default configuration, and if unsuccessful from the Instance Profile service on an EC2 instance.
Example App.config with credentials set.
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?> <configuration> <appSettings> <add key="AWSProfileName" value="AWS Default"/> </appSettings> </configuration>
member.param: The AmazonAWSHealthClient Configuration Object

member.name: M:Amazon.AWSHealth.AmazonAWSHealthClient.DescribeAffectedEntitiesAsync(Amazon.AWSHealth.Model.DescribeAffectedEntitiesRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary:
Returns a list of entities that have been affected by the specified events, based on the specified filter criteria. Entities can refer to individual customer resources, groups of customer resources, or any other construct, depending on the AWS service. Events that have impact beyond that of the affected entities, or where the extent of impact is unknown, include at least one entity indicating this.
At least one event ARN is required. Results are sorted by the lastUpdatedTime of the entity, starting with the most recent.
member.param: Container for the necessary parameters to execute the DescribeAffectedEntities service method.
A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.returns: The response from the DescribeAffectedEntities service method, as returned by AWSHealth.
member.exception: The specified pagination token (nextToken) is not valid.
The specified locale is not supported.
member.seealso: REST API Reference for DescribeAffectedEntities Operation

member.name: M:Amazon.AWSHealth.AmazonAWSHealthClient.DescribeEntityAggregatesAsync(Amazon.AWSHealth.Model.DescribeEntityAggregatesRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Returns the number of entities that are affected by each of the specified events. If no events are specified, the counts of all affected entities are returned.
member.param: Container for the necessary parameters to execute the DescribeEntityAggregates service method.
A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.returns: The response from the DescribeEntityAggregates service method, as returned by AWSHealth.
member.seealso: REST API Reference for DescribeEntityAggregates Operation

member.name: M:Amazon.AWSHealth.AmazonAWSHealthClient.DescribeEventAggregatesAsync(Amazon.AWSHealth.Model.DescribeEventAggregatesRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Returns the number of events of each event type (issue, scheduled change, and account notification). If no filter is specified, the counts of all events in each category are returned.
member.param: Container for the necessary parameters to execute the DescribeEventAggregates service method.
A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.returns: The response from the DescribeEventAggregates service method, as returned by AWSHealth.
member.exception: The specified pagination token (nextToken) is not valid.
member.seealso: REST API Reference for DescribeEventAggregates Operation

member.name: M:Amazon.AWSHealth.AmazonAWSHealthClient.DescribeEventDetailsAsync(Amazon.AWSHealth.Model.DescribeEventDetailsRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary:
Returns detailed information about one or more specified events. Information includes standard event data (region, service, etc., as returned by DescribeEvents), a detailed event description, and possible additional metadata that depends upon the nature of the event. Affected entities are not included; to retrieve those, use the DescribeAffectedEntities operation.
If a specified event cannot be retrieved, an error message is returned for that event.
member.param: Container for the necessary parameters to execute the DescribeEventDetails service method.
A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.returns: The response from the DescribeEventDetails service method, as returned by AWSHealth.
member.exception: The specified locale is not supported.
member.seealso: REST API Reference for DescribeEventDetails Operation

member.name: M:Amazon.AWSHealth.AmazonAWSHealthClient.DescribeEventsAsync(Amazon.AWSHealth.Model.DescribeEventsRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary:
Returns information about events that meet the specified filter criteria. Events are returned in a summary form and do not include the detailed description, any additional metadata that depends on the event type, or any affected resources. To retrieve that information, use the DescribeEventDetails and DescribeAffectedEntities operations.
If no filter criteria are specified, all events are returned. Results are sorted by lastModifiedTime, starting with the most recent.
member.param: Container for the necessary parameters to execute the DescribeEvents service method.
A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.returns: The response from the DescribeEvents service method, as returned by AWSHealth.
member.exception: The specified pagination token (nextToken) is not valid.
The specified locale is not supported.
member.seealso: REST API Reference for DescribeEvents Operation

member.name: M:Amazon.AWSHealth.AmazonAWSHealthClient.DescribeEventTypesAsync(Amazon.AWSHealth.Model.DescribeEventTypesRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Returns the event types that meet the specified filter criteria. If no filter criteria are specified, all event types are returned, in no particular order.
member.param: Container for the necessary parameters to execute the DescribeEventTypes service method.
A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.returns: The response from the DescribeEventTypes service method, as returned by AWSHealth.
member.exception: The specified pagination token (nextToken) is not valid.
The specified locale is not supported.
member.seealso: REST API Reference for DescribeEventTypes Operation

member.name: T:Amazon.AWSHealth.IAmazonAWSHealth
member.summary:
Interface for accessing AWSHealth
AWS Health
The AWS Health API provides programmatic access to the AWS Health information that is presented in the AWS Personal Health Dashboard. You can get information about events that affect your AWS resources:
DescribeEvents: Summary information about events.
DescribeEventDetails: Detailed information about one or more events.
DescribeAffectedEntities: Information about AWS resources that are affected by one or more events.
In addition, these operations provide information about event types and summary counts of events or affected entities:
DescribeEventTypes: Information about the kinds of events that AWS Health tracks.
DescribeEventAggregates: A count of the number of events that meet specified criteria.
DescribeEntityAggregates: A count of the number of affected entities that meet specified criteria.
The Health API requires a Business or Enterprise support plan from AWS Support. Calling the Health API from an account that does not have a Business or Enterprise support plan causes a SubscriptionRequiredException.
For authentication of requests, AWS Health uses the Signature Version 4 Signing Process.
See the AWS Health User Guide for information about how to use the API.
Service Endpoint
The HTTP endpoint for the AWS Health API is:
https://health.us-east-1.amazonaws.com

member.summary:
Returns a list of entities that have been affected by the specified events, based on the specified filter criteria. Entities can refer to individual customer resources, groups of customer resources, or any other construct, depending on the AWS service. Events that have impact beyond that of the affected entities, or where the extent of impact is unknown, include at least one entity indicating this.
At least one event ARN is required. Results are sorted by the lastUpdatedTime of the entity, starting with the most recent.
